scripts.dev: cd src/app && yarn install && yarn next dev
scripts.build: cd src/app && yarn install && NODE_ENV=production yarn next build
scripts.start: cd src/app && yarn install && NODE_ENV=production yarn next start
scripts.prep: yarn build && rm -r ./src/public/* && cp ./src/app/public/* ./src/public &&  mkdir ./src/public/_next &&  cp -r ./src/app/.next/static ./src/public/_next &&  cp ./src/app/.next/serverless/pages/*.html ./src/public &&  rm -rf ./src/functions/lambdas &&  mkdir ./src/functions/lambdas && cp ./src/app/.next/serverless/pages/*.js ./src/functions/lambdas && cd ./src/functions && yarn install
scripts.serve: yarn prep && NODE_ENV=production firebase serve --only functions,hosting
